def_cn: （尤用于机械的）润滑剂，润滑油
def_en: A lubricant is a substance which you put on the surfaces or parts of something, especially something mechanical, to make the parts move smoothly.

def_cn: （比喻有利于事情顺利进行的）润滑剂
def_en: If you refer to something as a lubricant in a particular situation, you mean that it helps to make things happen without any problems.
